title: Instructions for a house-cleaner
context: Tell the cleaning person to focus on the bathrooms and kitchen today.

content.bestLine: Please focus on the bathrooms and kitchen today

neutral.text: Today's tasks are bathrooms and kitchen
Focus on the bathrooms and kitchen
Bathrooms and kitchen are the priority
Make sure to clean the bathrooms and kitchen
The bathrooms and kitchen need attention
Please clean the bathrooms and kitchen thoroughly
Bathrooms and kitchen are the main focus

informal.text: Hey, can you hit the bathrooms and kitchen?
Today's chores are bathrooms and kitchen
Just focus on the bathrooms and kitchen, okay?
Bathrooms and kitchen are the top priority
Make sure you get the bathrooms and kitchen clean
Can you take care of the bathrooms and kitchen?
The bathrooms and kitchen need some love
Just get the bathrooms and kitchen done

formal.text: I would appreciate it if you could focus on the bathrooms and kitchen
The bathrooms and kitchen require attention today
Please ensure the bathrooms and kitchen are cleaned thoroughly
The priority for today is the bathrooms and kitchen
I need you to clean the bathrooms and kitchen today
The bathrooms and kitchen are the main areas of focus

patterns.meaning: request to prioritize bathrooms and kitchen

lines.speaker: Homeowner
lines.text: Please focus on the bathrooms and kitchen today

lines.speaker: Homeowner
lines.text: What are you going to clean first?

lines.speaker: House-cleaner
lines.text: The bathrooms and kitchen, like you asked
